page.title: 15Transport
page.content: In our survey all but 7% of the people we spoke to owned a car. This is essential as there is only a limited bus service serving the area. Only one bus a day is routed through Cock Clarks and many residents felt that the route should be changed because it is inconvenient. There is a private "bus service" run by a resident of Cock Clarks which is popular due to its flexibility. Hazeleigh garage is on the site of the old White Hart pub which used to have a petrol pump outside but which was closed down during the Second World War.
